thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text: I just discovered Airtasker and have now used it 3 times in 2 days. Having just moved house - I had excess old furniture to get rid of, new stuff to assemble, a garden to tidy - all done within 48 hours of posting. The 3 people I have engaged to help were all very lovely and easy to communicate with. It is such a simple interface to navigate online and very easy to connect with people to help. I have had only good experiences - I am a huge fan!!!
